Event.EventName: When you enter the police stations you see a cake in the foyer with the sign 'free, confiscated from a prisoner'

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: Who says you can't have your cake and eat it, take a mouthful
EventOption.EventOptionPostDescription: As you chow down your teeth crack on something hard... its a file... yes... really. Unfortunately your cracked tooth has opened up a new avenue for infections as well as reducing your immune system

EventOption.EventOptionDescription: I don't think eating a criminals cake is a good idea, better leave it alone
